metadata.title: CVE-2018-20030 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An error when processing the EXIF_IFD_INTEROPERABILITY and EXIF_IFD_EXIFtags within libexif version 0.6.21 can be exploited to exhaust availableCPU resources.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20030` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-4ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-4ubuntu0.2').
